 */function flattenArray(array){function flattenDown(array,result){for(var i=0;i<array.length;i++){var value=array[i];if(Array.isArray(value)){flattenDown(value,result);}else if(value!=null&&value!==false){result.push(value);}}return result;}return flattenDown(array,[]);}export default flattenArray;
